workflow.name: Automated email follow-up system with CentralStationCRM, Gmail and Slack alerts
workflow.description:
How it works
* time trigger using the cron format, every weekday at 5pm
* gets CentralStationCRM people updates of today
* checks for tag "Outreach"
* if true, sends message on gmail (predefine in node)
* waits 7 days, checks for answers
* alerts user if an answer is there
* if not, repeats process with second mail

How to set up
* get credentials for CentralStationCRM, Slack and GMail
* set up the respective nodes with the credentials
* define text for your automated mails
* test without wait nodes

workflow.name: A simple E-Mail automation for a tagged person in CentralStationCRM

parameters.text:
=Hi #YOURNAME#,

your contact {{ $('test for tag').item.json.person.salutation }} {{ $('test for tag').item.json.person.name }} has responded.

Look it up: 

https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#all/{{ $json.threadId }}

parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $('get CRM updates').item.json.person.salutation }} {{ $json.person.name }},

##CONTENT OF YOUR SECOND MESSAGE##

Best regards

##SIGNATURE##

SIGNATUR
parameters.subject: =Unser Gespr√§ch

parameters.text:
=Hi #YOURNAME#,

your contact {{ $('test for tag').item.json.person.salutation }} {{ $('test for tag').item.json.person.name }} has responded.

Look it up: 

https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#all/{{ $json.threadId }}

parameters.content:
![CSCRM Logo](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/Logo_Central_Station_CRM_0dd02e23d2.jpeg)

## A simple E-Mail automation for a tagged person in CentralStationCRM

* time trigger using the cron format
* gets CentralStationCRM people updates of today
* checks for tag "Outreach"
* if true, sends message on gmail (predefine in node)
* waits 7 days, checks for answers
* alerts user if an answer is there
* repeats process

*please test your workflow before using real contact data!! for testing, remove the wait nodes from the workflow by clicking on the trash can on the connecting lanes. then, reconnect the mail nodes to test. don't forget to reconnect the wait nodes after that, or you will flood your contact with mails.

this is meant to be an example to learn n8n, not to be a perfect execution of e-mail automation. Find ideas to make this workflow better in the project description.*

## Tools in this workflow
* [CentralStationCRM](https://centralstationcrm.de), your easy CRM software for small teams
* GMail, e-mail service by Google
* Slack, fast and easy messaging tool

## set up CentralStationCRM API Key
* log in to CentralStationCRM
* click on the gear wheel in the top right corner

![Account settings](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/CSCRM_Settings_edb73dede7.jpg)
![API key](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/CSCRM_Settings_API_cec6e99236.jpg)
* click "Create API key" on the right-hand side
* enter "Description" (e.g. n8n Test)
* save
* save the API key! The key cannot be called up again and is required for step 2.

## set up CentralStationCRM n8n credentials
![n8n menu](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/n8n_menu_credential_c73f8802bb.png)
![n8n cred type](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/n8n_Header_Auth_f635973075.png)
![n8n cscrm apikey](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/n8n_cscrm_credential_9690dfc9a2.jpg)
Important:
* select Header Auth as credential type
* assign X-apikey as name
* enter the CentralStationCRM API key under "Value"

## set up Slack nodes
* set up Slack credentials
![Credentials](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/Slack_Credential_0cab4ad78e.png)
![Credentials new](https://s3.42he.com/cscrm-marketing-page-production/Slack_Connect_Account_d1cc2420f3.jpg)
* choose your credential in the two slack nodes
* User (By Username): Enter @SlackUsername
* Customize text under "Message" if necessary

## set up Google nodes
* set up Gmail credentials (Connect with Google)
* choose your credentials in the four GMail nodes

user.name: CentralStationCRM
user.bio:
CentralStationCRM ist das einfache und intuitive CRM f√ºr kleine Teams. Auf n8n teilen wir unsere Workflow-Ideen: f√ºr schnellere Abl√§ufe und einen besseren Arbeitsalltag.

CentralStationCRM is the simple and intuitive CRM for small businesses. On n8, we share CRM-workflow ideas to speed up your working life!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
